SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT p.`Model_ID`,m.Introduce AS sIntroduce,m.Model_Name AS sName,m.IcoUrl AS sIcoUrl,p.Plan_RGB,DATE_FORMAT(p.`Plan_Time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS Plan_Time,p.`Plan_Status`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(p.`Plan_Time`) AS Plan_TimeTicks FROM TB_MB_Plan AS p JOIN `TB_MB_Models` AS m ON p.`Model_ID`=m.`ID` WHERE p.`Plan_Time`>=@@StartPlan_Time@@ AND p.`Plan_Time`<@@EndPlan_Time@@ AND m.`Status`=TRUE AND p.`Status`=TRUE ORDER BY p.`Plan_Time`;

SELECT p.`Model_ID`,m.Introduce AS sIntroduce,m.Model_Name AS sName,m.IcoUrl AS sIcoUrl,p.Plan_RGB,DATE_FORMAT(MIN(p.`Plan_Time`),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS Plan_Time,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(MIN(p.`Plan_Time`)) AS Plan_TimeTicks FROM TB_MB_Plan AS p JOIN `TB_MB_Models` AS m ON p.`Model_ID`=m.`ID` WHERE p.`Plan_Time`>=@@StartPlan_Time@@ AND p.`Plan_Time`<@@EndPlan_Time@@ AND m.`Status`=TRUE AND p.`Status`=TRUE GROUP BY p.`Model_ID` ORDER BY p.`Plan_Time`;
